title: Herbs and Supplements | Bella Vista Back Center | Chiropractic Care Holistic Doc
description: We offer Chiropractic Care as well as herbs and supplements. Holistic Doctor is available to recommend diet or supplement to treat your health naturally.

About us: Bella Vista Back Center has been serving our community for over 20 years. Dr. Carol Reynolds provides comprehensive and state-of-the-art modalities for all of our long-standing patients and those who have just discovered us. Dr. Laura McClelland provides alternative medicine that focuses on natural remedies to stimulate and support the body's own healing ability Our Services: COMPREHENSIVE HEALTH CARE for adults and children - Gentle Chiropratic Care - Natural Medicine Consultations - Cold Laser - General Health - Herbs and Supplements - Young Living Essential Oils - Prevention & Wellness - Nutritional Counseling - Work/School/Travel Exams With Dr. Carol Reynolds Laura McClelland, ND is available Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday
